rules_text:
When Pitiless Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Unearth {2}{G}{G} [i]({2}{G}{G}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
